meanings.definition: Excessively interested in or preoccupied with sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: She is hypersexual and talks about sex all the time.
meanings.sent2: He has a hypersexual personality, always making inappropriate comments.
meanings.sent3: The hypersexual jokes at work always make everyone blush.
meanings.sent4: Her hypersexual nature is like a fire that never goes out.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the hypersexual character with great intensity.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive or extreme sexual behavior.
meanings.sent1: The hypersexual behavior of the celebrity shocked the public.
meanings.sent2: Their relationship was strained due to his hypersexual tendencies.
meanings.sent3: The hypersexual cat kept trying to flirt with other felines.
meanings.sent4: The hypersexual atmosphere at the party was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The novel depicted a hypersexual society where boundaries were blurred.

meanings.definition: Showing an abnormally increased interest in sexual matters.
meanings.sent1: The hypersexual advertisements on TV made her uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: His hypersexual thoughts often distracted him from work.
meanings.sent3: The hypersexual art exhibit raised eyebrows in the conservative town.
meanings.sent4: The hypersexual energy in the room was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The play highlighted the hypersexual desires of the main character.
